_comment: KEEP UPDATES IN CHRONOLOGICAL ORDER; latest update will have 'new' tag on its card

updates.title: New School Year
updates.content: Math team will start this Saturday, 9/14 at 1 PM in room 150. We will run approximately every other week this year, and we'll tend to run from 1-4. Anyone from any grade with any interest and at any level of math knowledge is welcome to join if you have interest in math competition. Saturdays will tend to be a combination of lectures, actual competitions and practice competitions. In addition, I'm offering an elective on math team Mondays and Thursdays mods 25-27 for freshmen and sophomores. This will be geared towards math competition as well. If you have any questions, you can e-mail me at micabra@bergen.org or Mr. Pinyan at jonpin@bergen.org.

updates.title: Welcome
updates.content: Thank you to all who came to our first meeting on September 14. To view the lecture notes and homework problems from the meeting, visit the Archive page. Our next meeting will take place in two weeks (visit the Schedule page). Hope to see you there!
